name: Illyria
personality: My next commit is gonna be to an institution
startIntroPart1: My next commit is gonna be to an institution
attacked:
You're going to war in the Balkans? 
Alright pal.
defeated: What was the point of all this? Were we the heroes?
introduction: I am Queen Tetua, and this is a robbery.
neutralHello: Do you have a reason for coming here?
tradeRequest: Normally I'd just pirate it but I'm feeling generous...
uniques: All newly-trained [Land] units [in all coastal cities] receive the [Amphibious] promotion
All newly-trained [Land] units [in all cities] receive the [Ardiaei] promotion <in cities on [Hill] tiles>
Earn [50]% of killed [All] unit's [Cost] as [Gold] <when fighting in [Friendly] tiles>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Water] units>
uniqueText: Units are faster in coastal tiles; Land units built in coastal cities Receive the amphibious promotion, and those built in cities on hills receive no movement penalty from them. Steal 1/3 of the gold cost of killed enemy water units, and 1/2 the cost of units killed in your territory.
